screenshot.alt: Screenshot of a .pmdx file in SoftMaker Office PlanMaker 2018
screenshot.caption: PMDX file open in SoftMaker Office PlanMaker 2018

description: PMDX files are saved in a proprietary format and are the main file type associated with PlanMaker, a spreadsheet application similar to Microsoft Excel, which is included with Microsoft Office. PMDX files are used similarly to how .XLS and .XLSX files are used by Microsoft Excel. A PMDX file is created to store a spreadsheet and can be closed and reopened for further editing.

PMDX files may be created from a .PMV and .PMVX templates or XLS and XLSX spreadsheets. They may also be converted to various formats in PlanMaker, including .PDF , XLS, XLSX, .XLSM , .XLTX , .XLTM , .XLT , .TMD , and .RTF .
NOTE: PMDX files replaced .PMD files, which were used to store spreadsheets by older versions of PlanMaker.
